comment: The n-th power of a number decreased by 1 expressed by the finite geometric series ` 1 + A ^ 1 + A ^ 2 + ` ... ` + A ^ ( N - 1 ) ` . This alternate proof of ~ pwm1geoser is not based on ~ geoser , but on ~ pwdif and therefore shorter than the original proof. (Contributed by AV, 19-Aug-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
